CustomField.description: Shows the total Days this Implementation was at this status.
CustomField.formula: IF( ( TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Unset__c - TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Set__c ) > 26, (( TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Unset__c - TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Set__c ) -8), IF( ( TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Unset__c - TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Set__c ) > 19, (( TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Unset__c - TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Set__c ) -6), IF( ( TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Unset__c - TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Set__c ) > 12, (( TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Unset__c - TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Set__c ) -4), IF( ( TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Unset__c - TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Set__c ) > 5, (( TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Unset__c - TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Set__c ) -2), ( TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Unset__c - TS2_Initial_Communication_Status_Set__c ) ))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This displays approximate days that this record had the Implementation Stage set to include Initial Communication.
CustomField.label: Days at Initial Communication Status
